transcript.title: TASMAN BRIDGE - 8 JANUARY 1975

PRIME MINISTER PRESS STATEMENT NO. 430
8 January, 1975
TASMAN BRIDGE
The Prime Minister's Office has released the text of the
Scable sent last night to Captain B. J. Peic in the Royal Hobart
Hosoital. o r " I have seen your explanation of how the catastrophe
occurred. I withdraw unreservedly any imputations against you
and extend my apologies. E. G. Whitlam."
CANBERRA, A. C. T.
0
